ImageComparison.title: Remodeled Spaces
ImageComparison.description: See the significant improvements in interior and exterior design.

specialty.title: WHO ARE WE?
specialty.description: At RGB CORPORATION, we are specialists in construction with a focus on installation, remodeling, and demolition, as well as selling high-quality materials. We have a team of experts that guarantees durable, safe, and aesthetically perfect results. Our mission is to transform spaces with innovative solutions and top-tier materials, ensuring satisfaction and excellence in every project. From small renovations to large constructions, we work with commitment, professionalism, and attention to detail. Trust us to make your project a reality with the quality and efficiency that define us.

whyChooseUs.title: WHY CHOOSE US?
items: Wood, vinyl, linoleum, and laminate floors

commitment.title: WHY CHOOSE US?
description: Experience and Professionalism: With years of experience in the construction sector, we specialize in high-quality floor installation and remodeling. Our team consists of trained professionals who guarantee lasting and excellent results.
Commitment to Quality: We work only with top-quality materials, ensuring that every project, big or small, meets the highest standards of strength and aesthetics.
Personalized Attention: We make sure to understand the needs and desires of our clients, offering customized solutions and advice at every stage of the project.
Variety of Options: We offer a wide range of floors, from wood to ceramic, porcelain, and vinyl, suitable for all styles and budgets.
Fast and Efficient Process: We know how important time is, so we guarantee a quick and effective service without compromising work quality.
Competitive Prices: We offer fair and transparent rates, with no hidden costs, ensuring that our clients get the best value for their investment.
Guaranteed Satisfaction: Customer satisfaction is our priority. We make sure every job is completed as promised, with no exceptions.

Vinyl.title: Durability
Vinyl.description: Highly durable, resistant to scratches, stains, and moisture. Ideal for high-traffic areas.

Vinyl.title: Variety
Vinyl.description: A wide range of styles that mimic natural materials like wood, stone, or ceramic. Available in tiles, rolls, or planks.

Vinyl.title: Maintenance
Vinyl.description: Very easy to maintain. Requires sweeping and mopping. Stain and water-resistant.

Vinyl.title: Comfort
Vinyl.description: Flexible and soft underfoot, making it comfortable in spaces like kitchens and bathrooms.

Vinyl.title: Sensitivity
Vinyl.description: Highly resistant to stains and moisture, not sensitive to factors like humidity or heat.

Vinyl.title: Resistance
Vinyl.description: High wear and moisture resistance. Ideal for busy areas.

Vinyl.title: Aesthetics
Vinyl.description: Realistic imitations of natural materials with modern finishes. Visually versatile with a variety of designs.

Tile.title: Durability
Tile.description: Extremely durable, water-resistant, and wear-resistant. Perfect for high-traffic areas like kitchens, bathrooms, and entryways.

Tile.title: Variety
Tile.description: Available in a wide variety of colors, shapes, sizes, and finishes. Porcelain is denser and stronger than ceramic.

Tile.title: Maintenance
Tile.description: Requires regular cleaning with mild products. Grout can stain over time and needs maintenance.

Tile.title: Comfort
Tile.description: Can feel cold and hard underfoot, so rugs or radiant heating are recommended in cold climates.

Tile.title: Sensitivity
Tile.description: Sensitive to heavy impacts, like falling heavy objects, which can damage it.

Tile.title: Resistance
Tile.description: Very resistant to moisture, scratches, stains, and fading.

Tile.title: Aesthetics
Tile.description: Elegant, sophisticated, and available in a wide range of colors, patterns, and textures. Realistic wood or stone imitations.

Laminate.title: Durability
Laminate.description: Highly durable and wear-resistant, suitable for high-traffic areas.

Laminate.title: Variety
Laminate.description: Offered in many colors and textures, mimicking wood or stone.

Laminate.title: Maintenance
Laminate.description: Requires gentle cleaning. Avoid excess water.

Laminate.title: Comfort
Laminate.description: Softer underfoot compared to tile, good for living spaces.

Laminate.title: Sensitivity
Laminate.description: Sensitive to water and heavy impacts. Use with care.

Laminate.title: Resistance
Laminate.description: Good resistance to stains and scratches, but not waterproof.

Laminate.title: Aesthetics
Laminate.description: Beautiful, realistic visuals that resemble wood or stone, adaptable to various decors.

Wood.title: Durability
Wood.description: Very durable, especially with proper care. Prone to scratches, stains, and moisture damage if not maintained.

Wood.title: Variety
Wood.description: Available in hardwoods (oak, walnut, cherry) and softwoods (pine, fir). Engineered wood offers more stability.

Wood.title: Maintenance
Wood.description: Requires periodic polishing and sealing. Keep dry to avoid damage.

Wood.title: Comfort
Wood.description: Warm and pleasant to the touch. Ideal for creating cozy, natural environments.

Wood.title: Sensitivity
Wood.description: Sensitive to humidity, direct sunlight, and scratches. Sealers are recommended.

Wood.title: Resistance
Wood.description: Resistant to abrasion but can be damaged by moisture or strong impacts.

Wood.title: Aesthetics
Wood.description: Classic and elegant. Natural wood provides a unique, warm, and sophisticated look that fits many decor styles.
